title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 4822 - GENERAL CONDUCT OF BINGO IN LEASED PREMISES
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 4822 - GENERAL CONDUCT OF BINGO IN LEASED PREMISES

§ 4822.1 - Validity of rental agreement

§ 4822.3 - Rental not to be determined by receipts or net profits

§ 4822.6 - Reporting of rental income
§ 4822.7 - Effect of revocation
§ 4822.8 - Effect of suspension

§ 4822.10 - Written agreement to be filed
§ 4822.11 - Mandatory provisions
§ 4822.12 - Time during which agreement is effective
§ 4822.14 - Register required
§ 4822.15 - Report of bingo rental receipts
§ 4822.16 - Lessor may only make premises available to licensed organization
§ 4822.17 - Loaning or borrowing of money by lessor prohibited
§ 4822.18 - Lessor to notify licensing authority of all changes in structure
§ 4822.19 - Lessor to furnish additional information as required
§ 4822.20 - Display of license
§ 4822.21 - Collection of rent
§ 4822.22 - Badges
§ 4822.23 - Parties to food facility lease
§ 4822.24 - Special guards
§ 4822.25 - Restrictions on acceptance of public assistance

Notes

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-B, §435[1][a]; L. 1962, ch. 437; Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding

Law, §§ 104[1], [19], 128

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
